entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Rain at times mixed with wet snow early this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
